name: Hourly weather & waves data for today & tomorrow
CREATE TABLE hourly_data
func:
msg.topic = 'CREATE TABLE hourly_data (' +
    'latitude FLOAT,' +
    'longitude FLOAT,' +
    'temperature FLOAT,' +
    'humidity FLOAT,' +
    'rain FLOAT,' +
    'showers FLOAT,' +
    'snowfall FLOAT,' +
    'cloud_cover FLOAT,' +
    'wind_speed FLOAT,' +
    'wave_height FLOAT,' +
    'wave_direction FLOAT,' +
    'wave_period FLOAT,' +
    'timestamp TEXT' +
    ')';
return msg;

name: SELECT TABLE hourly_data
func:
msg.topic = 'SELECT * FROM hourly_data';
return msg;

name: DROP TABLE hourly_data
func:
msg.topic = 'DROP TABLE hourly_data';
return msg;
